Two-factor authentication adds an extra: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. Once enabled, you'll need both your password and an authentication code from your mobile device to log in.
After enabling two-factor authentication: After enabling two-factor authentication, store your recovery codes in a safe place. These codes will allow you to recover access to your account if you lose your mobile device.
Download and install a two-factor authen: Download and install a two-factor authenticator app on your mobile device:
